item.title: Upa Lokayukta orders crackdown on illegal mining in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: Upa Lokayukta B Veerappa has instructed officials from the mines and geology department to issue notices to companies involved in illegal mining following his inspection on Saturday.Veerappa visited Sri Venkateswara Minerals Stone Crusher (M-Sand), owned by Mitti Malkapur, on Mantralaya Road, where he criticised the operations for leaving the trench unsealed and unattended. He expressed his dissatisfaction over the company's failure to level the trench and plant trees. "Are you stil...]]>
item.author: Tnn
